snippet.title: Little Droid - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Little Droid is a challenging Metroidvania-style adventure. Navigate a mysterious world filled with secrets, deadly enemies, and environmental hazards. Master your abilities, manage your energy wisely, and uncover the truth behind a distant signal.

Little Droid launches on April 10th, 2025!
--------
Pre-order is open - March 27th, 2024 on Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Nintendo Switch.
Wishlist on PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5.
--------
Nintendo Switch – https://www.nintendo.com/store/products/little-droid-switch
PlayStation 4 and PlayStation 5 – https://store.playstation.com/concept/10012613
Xbox One X|S, Xbox Series X|S, Xbox for PC – https://www.xbox.com/games/store/little-droid/9NJC8V9NMFQX
--------
#indie #indiegame #metroidvania #platformer #action #adventure #game #ps5 #ps4 #switch #xbox
